name: Serendipity
description:
Welcome back Cupid!  It might not be Valentine's Day everyday, but that doesn't mean fated lovers shouldn't meet! Manipulate events like road closures, rush hour, and more so that these two star crossed lovers can meet by "chance"!

POST SUBMISSION FIXES:

  • Fixed some issues with win/loss button hitboxes
  • Fixed some typos in the instructions text
  • Fixed some sprite issues (some users are still experiencing these issues but we'll keep investigating)
  • Added a fullscreen option
  • Increased character sprite sizes for easier visibility

Programmer: PeaQueueAre

Musician: SirPython

Artist: andrewoid
